title: Introducing: Mattheu – Sanguine
body:
An impressive debut release by Manhattan based electronic soul artist [**Mattheu**](https://www.facebook.com/mattheumusic).

In **Sanguine, **[**Mattheu**](https://www.facebook.com/mattheumusic) moves with grace and beauty following the same paths as **Disclosure**, **Rhye** and **James Blake**. With an undoubtedly souful tone and sensual R&B-esque production, **Sanguine** proves that the N.Y vocalist/producer knows the game of seduction.

Mattheu’s debut EP, **Virgin**, is expected to drop soon

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/129210723″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
